column5: This archeological museum consists of reconstructed stilt houses, the earliest of which was built in the 1920s and based on excavations in the area. The museum has continued building houses throughout the years and tells the story of lake dwellers from 4000 BC to 850 BC. They also have goats.
column6: This museum tells the story of lake dwellers from 4000 BC to 850 BC, replete with stilt houses and goats.
column14: ['WIENXTRA-Spielebox', 'Vargas Museum', 'Museum of the Old Bridge', 'The Railway Preservation Society of Ireland Museum']
